text: Nole Floyd "Nokie" Edwards (May 9, 1935 - March 12, 2018) was an American musician and actor. He was a member of The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. He was a guitarist, best known for his work with The Ventures. Edwards was also an actor, who appeared briefly on Deadwood, an American Western drama television series. Edwards died on March 12, 2018 in Yuma, Arizona of a staph infection complicated from hip surgery at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Nokie Edwards talks about Deadwood HBO TV Series *Nokie Edwards Interview - NAMM Oral History Library (2004) Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from staphylococcal infection Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Infectious disease deaths in Arizona Category:American rock guitarists Category:American bass guitarists Category:American television actors Category:Musicians from Oklahoma Category:Actors from Oklahoma
title: Nokie Edwards
